bibl.title: Transmission of cleruchic land: a model to describe the procedure
bibl.note: Introduction. - Cleruchic land and the katoikoi: a summary. - The early steps of the procedure. - The Edict of Mettius Rufus, the βιβλιοθήκη ἐγκτήσεων and the Gnomon of the Idios Logos. - The procedure from the Ptolemaic period till the mid-first century AD. - The procedure in the Roman period. - A tentative model. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Paul Schubert, Transmission of Cleruchic Land: A Model to Describe the Procedure.

Introduction. - Cleruchic land and the katoikoi: a summary. - The early steps of the procedure. - The Edict of Mettius Rufus, the βιβλιοθήκη ἐγκτήσεων and the Gnomon of the Idios Logos. - The procedure from the Ptolemaic period till the mid-first century AD. - The procedure in the Roman period. - A tentative model. - Conclusion.
